text: Organization of Working-Class Freedom Fighters () or simply Razmandegan, was a communist party in Iran that opposed both the Soviet line and the guerrilla doctrine. ==References== Category:Defunct communist parties in Iran Category:Political parties of the Iranian Revolution Category:Banned political parties in Iran Category:Banned communist parties Category:Far-left political parties Category:Marxist organizations Category:1979 establishments in Iran Category:Political parties established in 1979
title: Organization of Working-class Freedom Fighters
